scripts.chain: npx ganache --database.dbPath ./ganache-db --chain.chainId 1337 --server.port 8545 --wallet.totalAccounts 10 --wallet.defaultBalance 1000 --wallet.mnemonic "hungry author action awake divorce journey second typical leisure lottery hunt fit"
scripts.deactivate:ganache: cross-env PROPERTY_ID=0 hardhat run scripts/deactivate-ganache.js --network ganache
